Episodes.Title: Green Iguana Helps Abuelito Plant a New Strawberry Farm!
Episodes.Plot: It's the growing season and time for Abuelito's Strawberry Festival! But when a strong Windy Wind blows all the strawberries away, Alicia must ask Diego for help.

Episodes.Title: Kicho's Magic Flute!
Episodes.Plot: Diego is visiting his good friend Kicho in the mountains. Kicho is an indigenous boy from the Andes who is an expert in music and instruments. His favorite instrument - a magic flute!

Episodes.Title: Rainforest Rhapsody
Episodes.Plot: Puma wants to sing in Alicia's rainforest concert, but when he scares off the other animal singers, Diego and the Red-Eyed Tree Frogs need your help to find them all again!
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Gorilla Fun
Episodes.Plot: Diego joins his friend Juma back in Africa to search for two missing baby Mountain Gorillas who are going to be crowned king! Will you help find the future Gorilla Kings?
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Tuga Helps the Moon
Episodes.Plot: The newly hatched baby sea turtles need moonlight to find their way back to the ocean, but when Luna breaks apart, Diego and Tuga the Leatherback Sea Turtle need your help to find the moon's four pieces so she can shine brightly again!

Episodes.Title: Whistling Willie Finds a Buddy
Episodes.Plot: "A duck and a jaguar make really silly friends!" sing Willie the Whistling Duck and Baby Jaguar. Willie's never seen a jaguar before, and the two quickly become buddies.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Super Flying Squirrel to the Rescue!
Episodes.Plot: When a nest of baby birds falls into a river, Diego gets some help from a super Flying Squirrel to rescue them! Will you help too on this high-flying rescue?.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Diego and Porcupine Save the Pinata!
Episodes.Plot: Diego and Alicia are having a party for Porcupine's birthday. Porcupine loves parties, especially the pinata! But the Bobos accidentally tie balloons on the pinata and send it floating in the air!
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The Bobo's Mother's Day!
Episodes.Plot: Diego and Alicia throw a party for Porcupine's birthday.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: It's a Bug's World!
Episodes.Plot: Diego, who has shrunken to bug size, helps a special bug make her way through the raindrop and spider webs in time for her to make it back to the beetle dance.

Episodes.Title: Diego and Dora Help Baby Monarch Get to the Festival
Episodes.Plot: Diego and Dora are heading to the annual Monarch Butterfly Festival when they discover a baby monarch on Snowy Mountain who's afraid to leave her cocoon. Can they help her in time to make it to the festivities?

Episodes.Title: Save The Giant Tortoises
Episodes.Plot: Lonely Louie is a rare Giant Tortoise from the Galapagos Islands who wants to find a friend. Will you help Diego and Dora travel to the Lost Island to find a friend for him?

Episodes.Title: Alicia and Whitetail to the Rescue
Episodes.Plot: Uh, oh! There's a rockslide in the desert! Dieg's moving the deer away from the rockslide and Alicia needs to make sure that no deer get left behind. Alicia finds a baby deer stuck in some bushes near the rockslide.

Episodes.Title: Manatee's Mermaid Rescue!
Episodes.Plot: Diego and Manatee set off on a mission to rescue mermaids who are trapped behind a stone wall.

Episodes.Title: Freddie the Fruit Bat Saves Halloween!
Episodes.Plot: Freddie the Fruit Bat must help the llamas cross the broken bridge so they can deliver the treats to Diego's Halloween party on time.

Episodes.Title: Egyptian Camel Adventure
Episodes.Plot: Help Diego, his friend Medina, and Jamal the Camel on an Egyptian journey to the Great Pyramids to find the Golden Cloud that will bring rain to the thirsty camels of the desert.

Episodes.Title: A New Flamingo Mami
Episodes.Plot: Diego needs you on a mountain rescue to help Miami Flamingo make it back to Flamingo Lake in time to see her baby hatch... and to save the rising lake water too!

Episodes.Title: The Great Polar Bear Rescue
Episodes.Plot: Diego, Dora, Alicia, and Baby Jaguar go to the Arctic to save some baby polar bears from melting ice.

Episodes.Title: The Great Polar Bear Rescue, Part 1
Episodes.Plot: Diego and Alicia set out to rescue a group of baby polar bears who are trapped alone on an island.

Episodes.Title: The Great Polar Bear Rescue, Part 2
Episodes.Plot: Diego and Baby Jaquar visit the Arctic Wildlife Center.
